titles.title: To authorize funds for the United States Marshals Service's Fugitive Safe Surrender Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/23/2006--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Marshals Service to establish, direct, and coordinate the Fugitive Safe Surrender Program to apprehend, in a safe, secure, and peaceful manner, federal, state, and local fugitives in coordination with local law enforcement and community leaders.
